title: Apple picks Google's Gemini to power Siri
author: stygiansonic
aiHeadline: Apple finally admits they can't do everything and teams up with Google's AI to make Siri less awkward.

title: Cowork: Claude Code for the rest of your work
author: adocomplete
aiHeadline: AI is now doing your job, so you can finally take that nap at your desk.

title: Floppy disks turn out to be the greatest TV remote for kids
author: mchro
aiHeadline: Kids today are so tech-savvy they're using floppy disks as remotes, proving that old tech is the new cool.

title: TimeCapsuleLLM: LLM trained only on data from 1800-1875
author: admp
aiHeadline: AI now thinks we're all wearing top hats and riding horses to work, thanks to this new model.

title: Ozempic reduced grocery spending by an average of 5.3% in the US
author: giuliomagnifico
aiHeadline: Finally, a weight-loss drug that also makes you a coupon-clipping master.
